```{mermaid}
graph TD
    Orig[Original data] --> Randomize{Randomize numerator}
	Randomize --> Randomized[Randomized data]
	Randomized --> RandomFit{Fit model to randomized data}
	RandomFit --> RandomResults[Random results]
	Orig --> OrigFit{Fit model to original data}
	OrigFit --> OrigResults[Original results]
	OrigResults --> Best{Select best model}
	Best --> OrigBest[Best fit to original data]
	RandomResults --> SelectAppropriateRandom{Filter to match best original model}
	OrigBest --> SelectAppropriateRandom{Filter to match best original model}
	OrigBest --> PredictOrig{Predict data using best model}
	SelectAppropriateRandom --> RandomAppropriate[Corresponding random data model]
	RandomAppropriate --> PredictRandom{Predict data using corresponding model}
	PredictOrig --> ComputeR2Orig{Compute R^2 of original with original prediction}
	PredictRandom --> ComputeR2Random{Compute R^2 of original with random prediction}
	ComputeR2Orig --> CompareR2[Compare R^2]
	ComputeR2Random --> CompareR2[Compare R^2]

	
 	
  
```
